title: PyPy status talk (a.k.a.: no no, PyPy is not dead)
summary: The current status of PyPy, with a particular focus on what happened in the last two years, since the last EuroPython PyPy talk.  We will give a brief overview of the current speed and the on-going development efforts on the JIT, the GC, NumPy, Python 3 compatibility, CFFI, STM...
